meta_title: Reference 7750 - Orfina Porsche Design Chronograph Ref. 7750 – Rehaut & Top Gun Details
meta_description: Discover the original Orfina Porsche Design Chronograph Ref. 7750 — the world’s first black PVD automatic chronograph with Valjoux 7750 movement. Learn about its rehaut design, Porsche‑inspired dial, and appearance in Top Gun.
meta_keywords: Orfina Porsche Design 7750, Porsche Design Chronograph 1, Valjoux 7750, Top Gun watch, Ferdinand Porsche watch design, black PVD chronograph, Porsche Design by Orfina, PD01, Chronograph 1 1970s, Orfina 7750 rehaut, Porsche Design dashboard dial
overview:
There are three known variations of Rehaut found in the 7750 model range.
These can be found across all 7750 case marks and dial variations.
note:
An interesting comparison is that despite being different measurements, the
1Mile and 1km have the same marks throughout their rehaut. This lack of detail
might explain that in the next reference of Orfina Porsche Design watches, the
manufacturer just put "Tachymetre" solely on the rehaut without either “unit”
designation.

variations.title: 1Mile
variations.note:
The 1Mile rehaut features tachymetric markings calibrated for
mile-based measurements, commonly used in markets following
imperial measurement systems.

variations.title: 1km
variations.note:
The 1KM rehaut features tachymetric markings calibrated for
kilometer-based measurements, designed for markets using the
metric system.

variations.title: Advertisement Rehaut
variations.note:
The Advertisement version had neither 1Mile nor 1km marks, but all
tachymetric scale markings. Likely unreleased in this way and possibly
done to serve multiple markets with a single advertisement.
